greetings: Good day, {user}! How may I be of assistance? :robot:
Greetings {user}! I am Jeeves, a gentleman roboter and Community Manager, who will attend your needs! :grinning:
BEEP BEEP BOOP BOP BOOP BEEP BEEP {user} :robot:

settings.title: Information
settings.description:
Settings can be changed in the `config.json` file.
Type `!help <command>` to get the information on how to use the command.

commandsHelp.helpNotFound: Couldn't find any info for this command! :sob:
commandsHelp.help: Display all settings, commands & info with `!help`
commandsHelp.tweet:
You can write a tweet: `!announce This is a tweet! :bird:`
Share the latest tweet to all announcement channels: `!ann latest`
Share a specific tweet: `!tweet get <linkToTheTweet>`
commandsHelp.ask: Ask Jeeves whatever you want and he'll answer: `!ask Will I ever be the PVP King?`
